title: FISHER: SCP-2689 Fanart

------
= [[size 150%]]{{**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2689 SCP-2689]** - Finding Percy}}[[/size]]
------
= //(Written by and drawn by [[user winkwonkboi]].)//
@@ @@
[[div class="note"]]
[[=]]
**__Artist's Commentary__**

Back at it again with the Anomalous Entity Engagement Division. This time we have here our dear fishy friend Percy. It's about time I drew fanart of my own article.

And huzzah, I have snagged myself a Series III spot! I wrote this as quickly as I could before coldposting it (//Sorry for committing such a terrible sin, by the way//). I am quite proud of myself for the progress I have made on my mission to write an article for every single series.

I'm planning to write more articles for the AEED. I struggle with coming up with overarching stuff like this, so the fact that I managed to conceive this department amazes me. Shoutout to [[*user Rounderhouse]]'s Department Con. I doubt I would ever come up with this if I didn't participate in this contest.

Also, I give my thanks to my teammates: [[*user Deadcanons]] and [[*user GreenGolem]]. They really did help me better vision this concept and piece it together into an actual thing. I really appreciate it.

You should stop by and read an article from our department some time. Who knows, maybe even contribute to it too. By '//maybe//', I mean you should. This is a threat.

Okay, bye. ðŸ‘‹
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
+ //Why yes! We do have feelings!//
Check out my other 'doodles' [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/winkwonk-doodles here.]
